ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( NOT(OR( ISCHANGED( Nokia_ID__c ) , ISCHANGED( NSA_Compliant__c ), ISCHANGED( NSA_Modified__c ) )), NOT(OR( $Profile.Name <> 'Global Process Admin Profile',$Profile.Name <> 'Integration API Only Profile', $Profile.Name <> 'System Administrator',$Profile.Name <> 'Data Loader Profile')))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: you cant edit user record unless you are an admin or global process admin
